## Description {#details}

A recipe to wrap on original IR instruction not to be modified during execution, execept for PHIs.

For PHIs, a single <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> operand is allowed, and it is used to add a new incoming value for the single predecessor VPBB. Expect PHIs, VPIRInstructions cannot have any operands.

Definition at line 1375 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
